Class RunQA.Configuration

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.sanity4j.ant.taskdef.RunQA.Configuration
Enclosing class:
RunQA
public static class RunQA.Configuration
extends Object

An ant type that stores a tool name / tool version / and the 'location' of a configuration file for the given tool.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a #Configuration associated with the given ANT Project.
